message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $160?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway last time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're still interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, so how about $165?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $155?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $162, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $150?
I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I think we've reached a fair price at $162, so I'm sticking with that.
